pages.title: Captain Cornelia
pages.text: Level: <level_t3>$(br2)While carrying $(boss/t4/guardian)Abyss Guard$(), use a $(key)Shell Horn$() on the $(bold)coast$() of a $(bold)Frozen Deep Ocean$() to summon $(key)Captain Cornelia$().$(br2)$(key)Shell Horn$(): obtained by killing the $(bold)Pillager$() in the $(bold)captain's cabin$() of a $(copy:Stranded Ship)Stranded Ship$()[$(copy:aquamirae:ship)aquamirae:ship$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().
